review: I hooked up my Amazon Fire TV over the holidays and am now addicted to Downton Abbey!!  lol...  I tried watching a movie (Hallmark movie) but it kept buffering...maybe it's my internet svc provider but I contacted AT&T; before I even hooked this up and upgraded to their 2nd to fatest internet speed (on their recommendation) but that obviously wasn't enough.  I haven't had any buffering problems watching Downton Abbey but I'm wondering if I'm going to continue to have issues w/ full-length movies.  This may be me and/or my provider and not Amazon's issue but I was disappointed that I couldn't watch the movie I wanted to on Christmas Eve.I'm still exploring this new device and need to figure out how to get sound through my Bose system.  But it's been fun so far and they seem to have a big selection of "free" stuff for Amazon Prime members.
